item.title: Importing Wikidata into Neo4j Using Neosemantics
item.description: Recently, I’ve spent quite a bit of time working on the ecosystem around Neosemantics, a toolkit for importing RDF data into Neo4j. A few weeks ago we released a Graph App which provides a UI to help you learn how to use the procedures provided in the library. I’ve also spent a couple of sessions recently with Jesus Barassa on the Neo4j Twitch Channel demonstrating how to use the Graph App and the library in general.
